text.title: Italian Food Is Overrated
text.p: Italian food is wildly overrated
seriously you guys are going to act up
over a little bit of pasta not me don't
get me wrong I've had some really good
Italian food in my life but I just don't
get why it's usually considered fine
dining in the US I lived in New York
City for a couple years and it's super
common to pay $30 to $40 for a bowl of
pasta at a restaurant that just blows my
mind trust me it's easy to make really
good Italian food I studied abroad in
Italy during college and I learned how
to make pasta and pasta sauce for my
host family and Italian grandmas and and
I learned that Simplicity is the key to
the best Italian food which means you
can make it yourself without paying so
much I know Italian food is more than
just pasta but let's be honest in the US
Italian food means pasta the thing that
irritates me is that everyone has no
problem paying $30 for some basic tomato
sauce noodles but then expects to pay
$15 for Indian food you ever tried
making Indian food way way more
complicated than making pasta and it
costs a lot more too right now I
probably sound crazy but one day you'll
wake up and realize that
